thread.title: Former US Sen. Mitchell to speak in Albany
thread.title_full: Former US Sen. Mitchell to speak in Albany - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Former US Sen. Mitchell to speak in Albany
text:
ALBANY, N.Y. (AP) - Former U.S. Senate Majority Leader George Mitchell will speak in Albany this week.
Mitchell will speak at Albany Law School on Wednesday about his book detailing how he helped broker the 1998 Good Friday Agreement. The landmark agreement addressed the longstanding conflict in Northern Ireland.
Mitchell was a senator from Maine for 15 years before his work seeking accords in Northern Ireland and the Middle East.
Mitchell's latest book is titled "The Negotiator: A Memoir."
